Mere Mad

Sticks'n'Sushi

japanese | asian | scandinavian

written by Tobias Larsen

This is our most traditional Japanese restaurant, thanks to the Japanese patterns that carve the path through the restaurant and into the kitchen, which is an island in the middle of the room. The restaurant is shaped like a big fish, and the tiles of the floor are coordinated to glisten like scales. The room combines Danish hygge with Japanese minimalism. We offer all our best dishes here, full of vegetables, meat and fish. Whether you prefer raw or grilled, you can rest assured that we offer a balanced mix of sushi, grilled delicacies on a stick, and colourful salad

https://sticksnsushi.com/ Book table
